tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cloud_resource_metrics (
    instance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    instance_name VARCHAR(50),
    service_name VARCHAR(50),
    cpu_usage DECIMAL,
    memory_usage DECIMAL,
    disk_usage DECIMAL,
    network_traffic DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE resource_usage_metrics (
    instance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    cpu_usage FLOAT,
    memory_usage FLOAT,
    storage_usage FLOAT,
    network_throughput FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    service_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    latency FLOAT,
    throughput FLOAT,
    error_rate FLOAT,
    availability FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE cloud_instances (
    instance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    instance_name VARCHAR(100),
    instance_type VARCHAR(50),
    region VARCHAR(50),
    usage_metrics JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE services (
    service_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name VARCHAR(100),
    service_type VARCHAR(50),
    service_status VARCHAR(20),
    service_metrics JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    instance_id UUID REFERENCES cloud_instances(instance_id),
    service_id UUID REFERENCES services(service_id),
    metric_name VARCHAR(100),
    metric_value DOUBLE PRECISION,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE cloud_instances (
    instance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    instance_name VARCHAR(255),
    provider VARCHAR(50),
    region VARCHAR(50),
    storage_used DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE service_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name VARCHAR(100),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    cpu_usage DECIMAL(5,2),
    memory_usage DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic (
    traffic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name VARCHAR(100),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    inbound_traffic DECIMAL(10,2),
    outbound_traffic DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE storage_metrics (
    storage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    storage_name VARCHAR(100),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    used_capacity DECIMAL(10,2),
    total_capacity DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE cloud_instances (
    instance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    instance_type VARCHAR(50),
    region VARCHAR(50),
    uptime TIMESTAMP,
    cpu_usage FLOAT,
    memory_usage FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE services (
    service_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name VARCHAR(50),
    provider VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(20),
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    instance_id UUID REFERENCES cloud_instances(instance_id),
    metric_name VARCHAR(50),
    value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    instance_id UUID REFERENCES cloud_instances(instance_id),
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    severity VARCHAR(10),
    message TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    last_login TIMESTAMP
)
